author: Anita
title: Chicken Caesar Wraps
ingredients: 1 pound cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts
3/4 cup Caesar Salad Dressing (bottled or homemade )
1/4 cup minced fresh flat leaf parsley
instructions_list: In a medium skillet, PLACE cooked chicken, dressing, parsley, Parmesan, and pepper. COOK on medium-low heat until heated through.
PLACE mixture on tortillas and TOP with lettuce, salad croutons, crumbled bacon and Parmesan cheese.
